properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
    '{Config.sourceSystem}'   AS SRC_SYS_CD,
(ADRC.NATION) AS INTNL_ADDR_VERS_CD,
(ADRC.ADDRNUMBER) AS PARTY_ADDRESS_ID,
TRIM(ADRC.COUNTRY) AS CTRY_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.CITY2) AS DISTRICT_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.POST_CODE1) AS POSTAL_CODE_NUM,
TRIM(ADRC.REGION) AS REGION_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.NAME1) AS PRTY_ADDR_NM1,
TRIM(ADRC.HOUSE_NUM1) AS HS_NUM1_TXT,
TRIM(ADRC.HOUSE_NUM2) AS HS_NUM2_TXT,
TRIM(ADRC.BUILDING) AS BLDG_NUM,
TRIM(ADRC.CITY1) AS CITY_NM,
case when ADRC.DATE_FROM = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(ADRC.DATE_FROM,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as VLD_FROM_DTTM,
case when ADRC.DATE_TO = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(ADRC.DATE_TO,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as VLD_TO_DTTM,
TRIM(ADRC.LANGU) AS LANG_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.NAME_CO) AS CNTCT_NM,
TRIM(ADRC.PO_BOX) AS PO_BOX_NUM,
TRIM(ADRC.SORT2) AS ADDR_SHRT_DESC,
TRIM(ADRC.STREET) AS ADDR_LINE1_TXT,
TRIM(ADRC.STR_SUPPL1) AS ADDR_LINE2_TXT,
TRIM(ADRC.STR_SUPPL2) AS ADDR_LINE3_TXT,
TRIM(ADRC.STR_SUPPL3) AS ADDR_LINE4_TXT,
TRIM(ADRC.TAXJURCODE) AS TAX_JURIS_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.TEL_NUMBER) AS PHN_NUM,
TRIM(ADRC.TIME_ZONE) AS TIME_ZN_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.NAME2) AS PRTY_ADDR_NM2,
TRIM(ADRC.NAME3) AS PRTY_ADDR_NM3,
TRIM(T005U.BEZEI) AS DESC_RGN,
TRIM(ADRC.COUNTY_CODE) AS CNTY_CD,
TRIM(T005F.BEZEI) AS DESC_CNTY_TEXT,
TRIM(ADRC.SORT1) AS SRCH_TERM_1,
TRIM(T005U.LAND1) AS CTRY_KEY_TAX,
TRIM(T005F.LAND1) AS CTRY_KEY_CNTY,
TRIM(ADRC.LOCATION) AS STREET_5,
TRIM(ADRC.COUNTY) AS COUNTY,
NULL AS LONG_NBR,
NULL AS LAT_NBR,
TRIM(ADRC.TITLE) AS FORM_ADDR_KEY,
TRIM(ADRC.NAME4) AS PRTY_ADDR_NM4,
TRIM(ADRC.NAME_TEXT) AS CNV_NM_FLD,
TRIM(ADRC.CITY_CODE) AS CITY_CD_CITY_STREET_FILE,
TRIM(ADRC.CITYP_CODE) AS DSTRC_CD_CITY_STREET_FILE,
TRIM(ADRC.HOME_CITY) AS CITY,
TRIM(ADRC.CITYH_CODE) AS DIFF_CITY_CITY_STREET_FILE,
TRIM(ADRC.CHCKSTATUS) AS CITY_FILE_TEST_STS,
TRIM(ADRC.REGIOGROUP) AS REGN_STRC_GRP,
TRIM(ADRC.POST_CODE2) AS PO_BOX_PSTL_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.POST_CODE3) AS CO_PSTL_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.PCODE1_EXT) AS CITY_PSTL_CD_EXTN,
TRIM(ADRC.PCODE2_EXT) AS PO_BOX_PSTL_CD_EXTN,
TRIM(ADRC.PCODE3_EXT) AS MAJ_CUST_PSTL_CD_EXTN,
TRIM(ADRC.DONT_USE_P) AS PO_BOX_ADDR_UNDLD_FL,
TRIM(ADRC.PO_BOX_NUM) AS FL_PO_BOX_WOUT_NUM,
TRIM(ADRC.PO_BOX_LOC) AS PO_BOX_CITY,
TRIM(ADRC.CITY_CODE2) AS CITY_PO_BOX_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.PO_BOX_REG) AS RGN_PO_BOX,
TRIM(ADRC.PO_BOX_CTY) AS PO_BOX_CTRY_RGN,
TRIM(ADRC.POSTALAREA) AS POST_DELV_DSTRC,
TRIM(ADRC.TRANSPZONE) AS TRSPN_ZN_GOODS_DELV,
TRIM(ADRC.DONT_USE_S) AS STREET_ADDR_UNDVD_FL,
TRIM(ADRC.STREETCODE) AS STREET_NUM_CITY_STREET_FILE,
TRIM(ADRC.STREETABBR) AS ABBR_STREET_NM,
TRIM(ADRC.HOUSE_NUM3) AS HS_NUM_RNG,
TRIM(ADRC.FLOOR) AS FLOOR_IN_BLDG,
TRIM(ADRC.ROOMNUMBER) AS RM_APT_NUM,
TRIM(ADRC.ADDR_GROUP) AS ADDR_GRP,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGGROUPS) AS FL_ADDR_GRP_ASGN,
TRIM(ADRC.PERS_ADDR) AS FL_PERSL_ADDR,
TRIM(ADRC.SORT_PHN) AS PHNTC_SRCH_SRT_FLD,
TRIM(ADRC.DEFLT_COMM) AS COMM_METH,
TRIM(ADRC.TEL_EXTENS) AS FST_PHN_EXTN,
TRIM(ADRC.FAX_NUMBER) AS FST_FAX_AREA_CD_NUM,
TRIM(ADRC.FAX_EXTENS) AS FST_FAX_EXTN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM2) AS FL_PHN_NUM_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM3) AS FL_FAX_NUM_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM4) AS FL_TELETEX_NUM_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM5) AS FL_TELEX_NUM_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM6) AS FL_EMAIL_ADDR_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM7) AS FL_RML_ADDR_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM8) AS FL_X_400_ADDR_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM9) AS FL_RFC_DEST_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM10) AS FL_PRTR_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM11) AS FL_SSF_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM12) AS FL_URI_FTP_ADDR_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.FLAGCOMM13) AS FL_PGR_ADDR_DEFIN,
TRIM(ADRC.ADDRORIGIN) AS ADDR_DATA_SRC,
TRIM(ADRC.MC_NAME1) AS NM_UP_CASE_SRCH_HELP,
TRIM(ADRC.MC_CITY1) AS CITY_NM_UP_CASE_SRCH_HELP,
TRIM(ADRC.MC_STREET) AS STREET_NM_UP_CASE_SRCH_HELP,
TRIM(ADRC.EXTENSION1) AS EXTN_DATA_CONV_DATA_LINE,
TRIM(ADRC.EXTENSION2) AS EXTN_DATA_CONV_TELEBOX,
TRIM(ADRC.ADDRESS_ID) AS PHY_ADDR_ID,
TRIM(ADRC.LANGU_CREA) AS ADDR_REC_CRT_ORIG_LANG,
TRIM(ADRC.ADRC_UUID) AS UUID_USED_ADDR,
TRIM(ADRC.UUID_BELATED) AS IN_UUID_CRT_LATER,
TRIM(ADRC.ID_CATEGORY) AS CAT_ADDR_ID,
TRIM(ADRC.ADRC_ERR_STATUS) AS ERR_STS_ADDR,
TRIM(ADRC.PO_BOX_LOBBY) AS PO_BOX_LBY,
TRIM(ADRC.DELI_SERV_TYPE) AS TYPE_DELV_SRVC,
TRIM(ADRC.DELI_SERV_NUMBER) AS NUM_DELV_SRVC,
TRIM(ADRC.TOWNSHIP_CODE) AS TWN_SHIP_CD,
TRIM(ADRC.TOWNSHIP) AS TWN_SHIP,
TRIM(ADRC.MC_COUNTY) AS CNTY_NM_UP_CASE_SRCH_HELP,
TRIM(ADRC.MC_TOWNSHIP) AS TWN_SHIP_NM_UP_CASE_SRCH_HELP,
TRIM(ADRC.XPCPT) AS BUSN_PRPS_CMPLT_FL,
case when ADRC._DATAAGING = '00000000' then null else to_timestamp(ADRC._DATAAGING,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as DATA_FIL_VAL_DATA_AGE_DTTM,
TRIM(ADRC.DUNS) AS DB_NUM,
TRIM(ADRC.DUNSP4) AS DUNS_4_NUM
FROM {Config.sourceDatabase}.ADRC ADRC
 left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.T005U on ADRC.COUNTRY=T005U.LAND1 AND ADRC.REGION=T005U.BLAND AND  T005U._deleted_ = 'F' AND T005U.SPRAS=\"E\"
 AND  T005U.MANDT = (SELECT L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_VAL from l1_md_prophecy_config.l1_parameters L1_PARAMETERS WHERE L1_PARAMETERS.ENV_NM = '{env}' AND L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_NM = 'mandt_filter')
 left join {Config.sourceDatabase}.T005F on ADRC.COUNTRY=T005F.LAND1 AND ADRC.REGION=T005F.REGIO AND ADRC.COUNTY_CODE=T005F.COUNC
 AND  T005F._deleted_ = 'F' AND T005F.SPRAS=\"E\"
 AND  T005F.MANDT = (SELECT L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_VAL from l1_md_prophecy_config.l1_parameters L1_PARAMETERS  WHERE L1_PARAMETERS.ENV_NM = '{env}' AND L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_NM = 'mandt_filter')
WHERE ADRC._deleted_ = 'F'
AND  ADRC.CLIENT = (SELECT L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_VAL from l1_md_prophecy_config.l1_parameters L1_PARAMETERS
WHERE L1_PARAMETERS.ENV_NM = '{env}' AND L1_PARAMETERS.PARAM_NM = 'mandt_filter')
  
 
""")
